Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 10
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.This tenth cartoon of the set shows Hu Feng passing on secret (internal) materials (内部资料) from Party organisations to newspaper offices (or vice versa).
